General.Name: Refinaria de Petróleos de Manguinhos S.A
General.Description: Refinaria de Petróleos de Manguinhos S.A. refines petroleum products in Brazil. It offers naphtha, gasoline, special solvents, LPG, kerosene, diesel, fuel oil, and other chemical products. The company also exports its products. Refinaria de Petróleos de Manguinhos S.A. was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Refinaria de Petróleos de Manguinhos S.A. is a subsidiary of XOROQUE Participações S.A.
General.Address: Brazil Avenue, 3141, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 20930-041
